mapper.select:
select ica.* , ic.cate_name as 'cateName' from inventory_category_associate ica LEFT JOIN inventory_category ic on ic.id = ica.inventory_category_id where 1=1 and ica.inventory_id = #{ inventoryCategoryAssociate.inventoryId }
${queryWrapper.customSqlSegment}
mapper.delete: delete from inventory_category_associate where 1=1 and inventory_category_id = #{categoryId}
delete from inventory_category_associate where 1=1 and inventory_id = #{inventoryId}
